entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
Introduction

Mon May 01 2017 12:00:00 GMT-0400 (Eastern Daylight Time)

Static Site Generator based on

  • Metalsmith - an extremely simple, pluggable static site generator
  • Gulp v4 - the streaming build system For those well acquainted with Jekyll, folder structure and naming convention of posts will be familiar.

Features

This site generator includes the following features:

  • Browsersync - time-saving synchronised browser testing (once you go live-reload, you'll never come back)
  • Sass - CSS with superpowers
  • PostCSS - a tool for transforming styles with JS plugins
  • Autoprefixer - adding vendor prefixes by the rules of Can I Use
  • ESLint - the pluggable linting utility for JavaScript and JSX (with preconfigured ruleset by Google)
  • Liquid - an awesome, Django/Jinja-like template engine for node.js (similar to Jekyll's Liquid)
